channelLineupByMso

@RequestMapping(value="channelLineupByMso")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> channelLineupByMso(@RequestParam(value="user")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String user)
Get a user's subscribed channels Example: http://localhost:8888/player/channelLineup?user=aghubmUzdm1zb3INCxIGTm5Vc2VyGKsEDA

Parameters:
user - user's unique key
Returns:
Channel info. Fields are tab delimited. Fields sequence: sequence, ChannelId, ChannelName, ChannelThumbnailUrl

curatorInfo

@ResponseBody
public java.lang.String curatorInfo(@RequestParam(value="curator")
                                                 java.lang.String curator,
                                                 @RequestParam(value="delimited",required=false)
                                                 java.lang.String delimited)
Get curator information based on curator key

Parameters:
curator - MsoKey
Returns:
curator info. Fields are tab delimited. Fields sequence: msoName, msoIntro, msoThumbnailUrl

nnScript

@RequestMapping(value="nnscript")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> nnScript(@RequestParam(value="program")
                                                                                         long programId)
Get program script based on program id Examples: http://localhost:8888/player/nnscript?program=566

programInfo

@RequestMapping(value="programInfo")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> programInfo(@RequestParam(value="channel")
                                                                                            java.lang.String channel,
                                                                                            @RequestParam(value="user",required=false)
                                                                                            java.lang.String user,
                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req)
Get program information based on query criteria.

Examples:
http://localhost:8888/player/programInfo?channel=*&user=aghubmUzdm1zb3INCxIGTm5Vc2VyGKsEDA
http://localhost:8888/player/programInfo?channel=153,158
http://localhost:8888/player/programInfo?channel=153

Parameters:
channel - could be *, all the programs, e.g. channel=* (user is required for wildcard query) could be channel Id, e.g. channel=1 could be list of channels, e.g. channels = 34,35,36
user - user account, it is required for wildcard query
Returns:
Program info. Each program is separate by carriage return. Fields of data in each program is tab delimited. Fields sequence: channelId, programId, programName, programType, programThumbnailUrl, contentFileUrl
